name: Z
detailed_description:
Z is a survival game set in a world infested with zombies with the perspective of a top down shooter. Explore a world destroyed by disease, scavenge for food, drinks, and weapons and survive as long as you can against the zombies and nature.

Features

  • Exploration - Explore the hand crafted open world going where you want when you want searching what you find.
  • Enemies - The world is infested with zombies, try to fight them off or run away to survive.
  • Loot - Scavenge the world and the many buildings for loot to keep yourself alive. Find food, drink, and medical supplies to stay healthy. Find weapons and ammo to keep from being eaten alive.
  • Survive - Use the food, drinks, and medical supplies you have scavenged to stay alive.
  • Fight - Use the weapons you find to fight off the zombies.
